content: slip 2 wyif knit 12 slip 1 wyif knit ting wrap together with wrapped stitch to 1 stitch before wrapped stitch w&t next row slip 1 wyib knit to end size l only work short-row wedges part a & b three times more end- next rs row slip 2 wyif knit 12 slip 1 wyif knit to 1 stitch ing your last repeat of b just before the ** before wrapped stitch w&t all sizes next row ws knit next rs row slip 2 wyif knit 12 slip 1 wyif knit to end knitting wraps together with wrapped stitches if you are not cut yarn leaving 1½-yd tail undo provisional cast-on and familiar with this reference short-row tutorial place stitches on a spare needle using kitchener stitch graft next row slip 1 wyib knit to end first row to final row for instructions on how to graft in garter stitch visit http //www knittingdaily com/glossary/graft- short-row wedge part b ing-garter-stitch/ row 1 slip 2 wyif knit 12 slip 1 wyif knit 24 27 w&t row 2 and all wsr knit finishing weave in ends all efforts were made to make this pattern error-free for questions or support please email info@fairmountfibers com 1/31/17 © fairmount fibers ltd 2016 not to be reproduced or re-knit for profit page 3 of 3
